trans-unit.source: Install the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> Server in Silent Mode

seg-source.mrk: Install the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> Server in Silent Mode

target.mrk: Installer le serveur <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> en mode silencieux

trans-unit.source: If you cannot install in graphical mode, you can install/upgrade <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> in silent mode.

seg-source.mrk: If you cannot install in graphical mode, you can install/upgrade <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> in silent mode.

target.mrk: Si vous ne pouvez pas installer en mode graphique, vous pouvez installer/mettre à jour <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> en mode silencieux.

trans-unit.source: To do so, you must create a batch file and use this file to install <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> on machines without graphical or X terminals.

seg-source.mrk: To do so, you must create a batch file and use this file to install <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> on machines without graphical or X terminals.

target.mrk: Pour ce faire, vous devez créer un fichier batch puis l’utiliser pour effectuer l’installation <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> sur des machines sans terminal graphique ou terminal X.

trans-unit.source: To install <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> in silent mode

seg-source.mrk: To install <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> in silent mode

target.mrk: Pour installer <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> en mode silencieux

trans-unit.source: Open the batch_install_sample.txt sample file located in the Server directory of the product iso.

seg-source.mrk: Open the batch_install_sample.txt sample file located in the Server directory of the product iso.

target.mrk: Ouvrez le fichier batch_install_sample.txt qui se trouve dans le répertoire Server du téléchargement du produit.

trans-unit.source: Set the value of the required parameters according to your environment and save the batch file as a text file.

seg-source.mrk: Set the value of the required parameters according to your environment and save the batch file as a text file.

target.mrk: Sélectionnez la valeur des paramètres obligatoires en fonction de votre environnement et enregistrez le fichier comme fichier texte.

trans-unit.source: To edit the file in Windows, use a text editor such as Wordpad or Notepad++, not Microsoft Word or equivalent as it may corrupt the file syntax.

seg-source.mrk: To edit the file in Windows, use a text editor such as Wordpad or Notepad++, not Microsoft Word or equivalent as it may corrupt the file syntax.

target.mrk: Pour modifier le fichier sous Windows, utilisez un éditeur de texte tel que Wordpad ou Notepad++, et non Microsoft Word ou équivalent car cela pourrait corrompre la syntaxe du fichier.

trans-unit.source: Use double backslashes in Windows paths.

seg-source.mrk: Use double backslashes in Windows paths.

target.mrk: Vous devez utiliser des antislashs doubles pour les chemins Windows.

trans-unit.source: The sample below is set to install <MadCap:variable name="ALN.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

seg-source.mrk: The sample below is set to install <MadCap:variable name="ALN.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

trans-unit.source: Launch the installer using this command:

seg-source.mrk: Launch the installer using this command:

target.mrk: Lancez l’installation à l’aide de la commande suivante :

trans-unit.source: <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> install starts automatically with the parameters specified in your batch file.

seg-source.mrk: <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> install starts automatically with the parameters specified in your batch file.

target.mrk: <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> est installé automatiquement avec les paramètres spécifiés dans le fichier batch.
